messages.content:
<image>
Given a food image, output only the recipe title and ingredient list in JSON format.
The JSON should look like this:
{"title": "<title>", "ingredients": [{"name": "<name>", "note": "<note>"}, ...]}
Do not output cuisine/meal/dish labels, amounts, or ratios.

{"title": "Corn dogs", "ingredients": [{"name": "flour", "note": "hemp"}, {"name": "cornmeal (polenta)", "note": "cooked"}, {"name": "salt", "note": "table, non-iodised"}, {"name": "pepper", "note": "black or white, ground"}, {"name": "egg", "note": "chicken, whole, raw"}, {"name": "water", "note": "filtered"}]}
